contents: As a visiting ph.D student, I will visit the NYU Data Science Center. I plan to collaborate with Prof. Kyunghyun Cho.
Two papers were submitted to Interspeech 2022.
Three papers have been accepted to ISMIR 2021 (Proceedings, NLP4Musa, LBD Session).
I'm starting a research internship at ByteDance (Speech, Audio, and Music Intelligence Team).
